tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE variant_data (
    variant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    variant_name VARCHAR(50),
    gene_name VARCHAR(50),
    chromosome VARCHAR(5),
    position INT,
    allele_freq FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Variants (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
variant_name VARCHAR(50),
chromosome_number INT,
position INT,
reference_allele VARCHAR(1),
alternate_allele VARCHAR(1))

CREATE TABLE Diseases (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
disease_name VARCHAR(50),
associated_genes VARCHAR(100),
severity_level VARCHAR(20))

CREATE TABLE VariantData (
  variant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name TEXT,
  variant_type TEXT,
  variant_location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE DiseaseData (
  disease_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_name TEXT,
  disease_description TEXT,
  risk_factor TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PatientData (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name TEXT,
  age INT,
  gender TEXT,
  blood_type TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE DiseaseVariantMapping (
  mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  variant_id INT,
  disease_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (variant_id) REFERENCES VariantData(variant_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (disease_id) REFERENCES DiseaseData(disease_id)
)

CREATE TABLE variants (
  variant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  variant_name VARCHAR(255),
  gene_name VARCHAR(255),
  variant_type VARCHAR(50),
  chromosome VARCHAR(10),
  position INT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  age INT,
  dob DATE
)

CREATE TABLE diseases (
  disease_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patient_variants (
  patient_variant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  variant_id INT,
  genotype VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE studies (
  study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  study_name VARCHAR(255),
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)
